Sentencas: Electrolyte coatings by atmospheric plasma spraying were prepared by 4.5 mol% ytrria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) powders manufactured by agglomerate-sintered (A-S) and fusing-crashed (F-C) processes.
Titulo: Effect of powder structure on microstructure and electrical properties of plasma-sprayed 4.5 mol% YSZ coating

Sentencas: Microstructure of the powders and the coatings were characterized using scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Effect of powder structure on microstructure and electrical properties of plasma-sprayed 4.5 mol% YSZ coating

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the coatings was investigated using both impedance spectroscopy and DC methods.
Titulo: Effect of powder structure on microstructure and electrical properties of plasma-sprayed 4.5 mol% YSZ coating

Sentencas: The results showed that the electrical conductivity of coating prepared with A-S powder was lower than that with F-C powder.
Titulo: Effect of powder structure on microstructure and electrical properties of plasma-sprayed 4.5 mol% YSZ coating

Sentencas: It was found from the impedance analysis that both the grain and grain boundary resistances were large in the coating formed by A-S powder.
Titulo: Effect of powder structure on microstructure and electrical properties of plasma-sprayed 4.5 mol% YSZ coating

Sentencas: This fact resulted from deposition of partially melting of spray particles.
Titulo: Effect of powder structure on microstructure and electrical properties of plasma-sprayed 4.5 mol% YSZ coating

Sentencas: A model was proposed to explain the effect of powder structure and melting state on the coating microstructure and properties.
Titulo: Effect of powder structure on microstructure and electrical properties of plasma-sprayed 4.5 mol% YSZ coating
